verses.name: Exodus 39:23
verses.text: And there was an hole in the midst of the robe, as the hole of an habergeon, with a band round about the hole, that it should not rend.

verses.name: Exodus 39:24
verses.text: And they made upon the hems of the robe pomegranates of blue, and purple, and scarlet, and twined linen.

verses.name: Exodus 39:25
verses.text: And they made bells of pure gold, and put the bells between the pomegranates upon the hem of the robe, round about between the pomegranates;

verses.name: Exodus 39:26
verses.text: A bell and a pomegranate, a bell and a pomegranate, round about the hem of the robe to minister in; as the Lord commanded Moses.
